comments: This is a great class if you're willing to put a lot of time and creative energy into your work!! It's a great chance to get feedback on everything you make and to grow creatively.
Great professor and potential to experiment and really be challenged. You won't be allowed to squeak by with the same stuff week after week.
This class will push you in all the best ways and you will find techniques in your own painting practice you didn't know existed.
This course requires you to really work, but you have a lot of freedom to create whatever you like.
Open your mind, let go of preconceptions, let the experience being you along, think deeply, apply that thinking to the surface in your work.
